Name: Ice Battle
About the game: Hockey is one of the most famous sports, as popular as football and basketball. This time your team can also participate in the hockey tournament. Choose a country, and then, according to the standings, your team and the opposing team will appear on the hockey field. We offer you Ice Battle - an arcade game with the mechanics of a hockey simulator. The game perfectly conveys the dynamics of real hockey, thanks to its game mechanics. In it, you control a team of cartoonish hockey players who skate on the ice and fight for possession of the puck. The gameplay is quite simple: you are trying to score the puck into the goal and your opponent is doing the same. Whoever ends up scoring the most goals wins. To control the player, you need to click on the hockey player of your team and pull in the opposite direction from the blow. The camera looks at the playing field from above, so you are always well aware of what is happening on the playing field.
